articles.description: EXCLUSIVE Kate arranged the 25th birthday treat for her close friend and co-star Saoirse by asking the film’s director to change the shooting schedule
articles.content:
Actress Saoirse Ronan was overcome with excitement as she ripped the wrapping off her birthday present because the wrapping in question happened to be Kate Winslets clothes.
And the present? A day f… [+6168 chars]
